Indulge your guests in the sweet ecstasy of merriment and jubilancy by serving succulent desserts and refreshing appetizers in these classy quadrangular Mini Plastic Appetizer Plates. These Disposable Dessert Plates are specially crafted from premium quality plastic, which makes them a perfect choice for indoor/outdoor events, birthday parties, weddings, baby/bridal showers, tasting events, buffets, banquets, or other catered functions. 

These splendid plates combine the convenience of plastic with the appealing look that mimics the crystal glass. The attribute of disposability makes the tidying up time a breeze. These classy plates help in bringing out the true beauty of desserts, appetizers, and other small portions of delightful treats. entry.title: 3 Pack | Food Cover Mesh Food Tent Pop Up Umbrella Tents For Outdoor Parties BBQ - Assorted Sizes
entry.summary:
Vendor: eFavormart
Type: Decorations
Price: 9.19

[About]

Quantity: 3 Food Covers - Different sizes
Net Material: Polyester Net With Metal Wiring
Color: White

1 Set Contains:

  • 1x Large Mesh Tent Cover
  • 2x Small Mesh Tent Cover

Small Mesh Tent Size: 10"H x 17"L x 17"W

Large Mesh Tent Size: 18"H x 37.5"L x 24"W

    Big Sizes : These are large enough to contain a party sized platter of food, and tall enough to shelter a good sized pot, plate.

    Collapsible : Easy to use & store, pull Up to open, press and pull Down to fold.

    Washable & Reusable : Remove stains by simply wiping the tents with a damp cloth. Most stubborn stains may be quickly hand washed. Air drying is recommended.

    Portable : Easy to take it anywhere, Can be hanged for storage.

    All sizes are approximate measurements

    Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

      [Information]

      Pop Up Food Covers
      Do you love enjoying your food outdoors but those creepy unwanted guests just spoil all your alfresco dining fun? Fret not, cutoff all bugs and bees easily and elegantly with our pop up food covers. Crafted from high quality polyester material and stainless steel frame, these food screens are environmental friendly and sturdy. Super dense mesh maximizes food safety and freshness while durable metal frame keeps the tent intact and in place.
      Food Cover Tents
      Offering sufficient space, these tents can effortlessly accommodate most plates and dishes. Featuring convenient pop up design and easy folding, these food cover tents are easy to open, collapses like an umbrella and stocks slender. Easy to clean, simply rinse off and air dry to be reused again. Perfect for camping, patio dining, family cookouts, BBQs, picnics, to cover your popcorns during outdoor movie nights, DIY Sundae station, tailgating, or meal preparation, works as your cake protector and even for bistro restaurants or summer catering events.

      Easy To Use & Store

      Sheer mesh design not only protects your food from bugs and pests, but also allows heat to escape and elegantly exhibits food. With lovely lace bottom finish, not only your food will be safe from sneaky pests but an aesthetic element will also be added into your food display. This outdoor tent food cover is ideal for large crowds or moving buffet, easy to lift with one hand and replace again. Highly ecofriendly and reduces carbon footprints, these tents are better than tinfoil, paper towels or paper plates with zero waste.

      Multi-purpose & Versatile

      These outdoor food tents are highly versatile and multipurpose. Either use to safeguard your food and fruits, or protect your plants and vegetation. Ideally can be given as a housewarming gift, grill master or gardener gift, these protective domes also double as an garden plant protector. Cover your seedlings in spring or fall, protect from birds, squirrels, slugs, or harsh winds. Work best as row covers for vegetables, or for mushroom and herb drying or insect habitat.
       
      Additional Information:
      Small Mesh Tent:
      • Tent Shape: Square
      • Overall Size (Opened): 10"H x 17"L x 17"W
      • Inner Height: 8"
      • Overall Size (Closed): 16"H x 4"W
      Large Mesh Tent:
      • Tent Shape: Rectangle
      • Overall Size (Opened): 18"H x 37.5"L x 24"W
      • Inner Height: 15"
      • Overall Size (Closed): 30.5"H x 6"Width

  • Note: Comes with: Glass Dispenser, Stand, Lid, and a Bag containing a Spout, Liquid Stopper, Plastic Security Bolt
  • Perfect for lemonade, tea, limeade, orange juice, sangria, punch, ice water, and more!
  • Uses: Ideal for any formal or casual occasion including dinner parties, weddings, birthdays, holidays, reunions, mitzvahs, and more!

How to Care:

  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all vases should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.

  • Note: Comes with: Glass Dispenser, Stand, Lid, and a Bag containing a Spout, Liquid Stopper, Plastic Security Bolt
  • Uses: Ideal for any formal or casual occasion including dinner parties, weddings, birthdays, holidays, reunions, mitzvahs, and more!

How to Care:

  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all vases should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.
